All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvanceOrderCommand
Implementation of the Order interface for executing the advance order.
AirliftOrderCommand
Implementation of the Order interface for executing the airlift order.
BlockadeOrderCommand
Implementation of the Order interface for executing the blockade order.
BombOrderCommand
Deals with the bomb order execution in Order.
CmdUtils
Contains helper methods to manage command line operation
CmdUtilsTest
JUnit test cases for the Cmd Utils class.
ConsoleLogger
A realization of Observer to update the messages in the console of the warzone game
Continent
Represents a continent in the Warzone main.java.game.
ContinentTest
JUnit test cases for the Continent class.
Country
Represents a country in the Warzone main.java.game.
CountryTest
Provides comprehensive test coverage for the Country class, focusing on validating the functionality of ID, name, continent presence, and adjacency relationship management.
DeployOrderCommand
Deals with the deploy order execution in Order.
DiplomacyOrderCommand
Deals with the diplomacy order execution in Order.
FileUtils
This class is used to manage utils for file operations It provides utility methods for file operations in the Warzone game.
FileUtilsTest
JUnit test cases for the File Utils class.
GameEngine
Class to handle different phase of main.java.game and drive the complete main.java.game.
GameEngineTest
Unit tests for GameEngine focusing on critical functionalities such as game phase transitions.
GameLogger
Implements the Observer interface to provide logging functionality.
GameLoopServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService interface.
GameLoopServiceImplTest
Unit tests for GameLoopServiceImpl focusing on the execution of user commands during the main game loop phase.
GameMapDataHandler
Interface for managing main.java.game map data.
GameMapDataHandlerImpl
Implements the GameMapDataHandler interface.
GameMapDataHandlerImplTest
Tests for GameMapDataHandlerImpl focusing on game map creation and saving functionalities.
GamePhase
This enum is designed for different phases of the main.java.game.
GamePhaseService
Interface specifying the behaviors necessary for every game phase.
GamePhaseTest
Tests for validating the functionality of the GamePhase enumeration in the context of retrieving the correct GamePhaseService implementation for each game phase.
GamePlay
Concrete class to manage the main menu of the game.
GamePlayTest
Tests for GamePlay focusing on verifying the functionality of the main menu.
GameSession
Concrete class to access and manage the parts of game session.
GameSessionTest
Validates the functionality of the GameSession class, ensuring the correct management of game entities such as continents, countries, and players.
GameSessionValidator
validates the created main.java.game Session.
GameSessionValidatorTest
JUnit test cases for the map validator.
LogEntryBuffer
A realization of Observable which informs all the observing observers about the change.
Main
Main Class to initialize warzone game.
MainTest
Unit tests for the Main class to ensure it handles the game's start-up and exit procedures correctly.
MapEditorServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService interface.
MapEditorServiceImplTest
Tests for MapEditorServiceImpl focusing on verifying the functionality of continent and country management commands, neighbor relations, as well as utility commands such as show map, list maps, help, and the processing of invalid commands.
Observable
Interface specifying the contract of the observable
Observer
Interface specifying the contract of the observer.
Order
Represents an order issued by a player in the Warzone main.java.game.
OrderDetails
Stores the details of a given order
OrderExecutorServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService interface managing the order issuance phase in the Warzone main.java.game.
OrderExecutorServiceImplTest
Tests the functionalities of OrderExecutorServiceImpl by simulating order execution within a game session.
OrderIssuanceServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService interface managing the order issuance phase in the Warzone main.java.game.
OrderIssuanceServiceImplTest
Tests the OrderIssuanceServiceImpl for handling the issue order phase in the game.
OrderTest
This class tests the functionalities of the Order class, ensuring that orders are correctly created, modified, and executed within a game session.
Player
Represents a player in the Warzone main.java.game.
PlayerTest
Unit tests for the Player class.
ReinforcementServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService Orchestrating reinforcement distribution based on owned territories and continent control, ensuring fair play and strategic depth.
ReinforcementServiceImplTest
Tests the ReinforcementServiceImpl to ensure correct handling of the reinforcement phase in the game.
StartupPhaseServiceImpl
Implements the GamePhaseService that represents the main.java.game's startup phase.
StartupPhaseServiceImplTest
Tests the functionality of StartupPhaseServiceImpl during the game's start-up phase.
WarzoneBaseException
The base exception class for Warzone custom exceptions.
WarzoneBaseExceptionTest
Provides unit tests for WarzoneBaseException to ensure its correct operation.
WarzoneConstants
Class containing all the constants referenced in the code.
WarzoneConstantsTest
Tests to validate the constant values in WarzoneConstants.
WarzoneRuntimeException
This exception is thrown when there is a runtime error in the program.
WarzoneRuntimeExceptionTest
Unit tests for WarzoneRuntimeException to ensure its proper instantiation and behavior.
WarzoneValidationException
This exception is thrown when there is a validation error in the program.
WarzoneValidationExceptionTest
Unit tests for WarzoneValidationException to ensure correct behavior for both instantiation without a message and with a specific error message.
